name: Burikinia
startIntroPart1: Salutations to you, President Anto Kertajaya. The nation of Burikinia has entrusted you to guide its fate upon your hands.
startIntroPart2: Anto Kertajaya, are you up to the task of bringing Burikinia to its glory? We shall find out.
declaringWar: After much consideration, we have decided that your nation should cease to exist. Prepare for war.
attacked: Ah, you want to attack us? Good luck, as I shall destroy you.
defeated: You think you're so awesome after you defeated us? Think again. I wish you the worst of luck.
introduction: Greetings. I am Anto Kertajaya, President of Burikinia. May our nations prosper together.
hateLetsHearIt: Hurry up, I don't have all day.
hateNo: Are you making fun of us?
afterPeace: Oh, now you want peace? Very well.
tradeRequest: We would like to offer you a trade request..
